Package net.marfgamer.jraknet.server

Class ServerPing

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.server.ServerPing

  • public class ServerPing
extends java.lang.Object
    Used primarily to box an identifier sent in the response of a server to a ping sent by a client so it can be modified by the user.
    Author:
    Whirvis "MarfGamer" Ardenaur

                  Identifier identifier,

        Constructs a ServerPing with the specified address and Identifier.

        sender - the address of the ping sender.
        identifier - the Identifier to respond with.
        connectionType - the connection type of the ping sender.
